titles.title: Nineteenth Sunday in Ordinary Time - Year C Psalms

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Blessed the people
the Lord
has chosen as his heritage.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ring out your joy to the Lord,
O you just;
for praise is fitting
for the upright.
Blessed the nation whose
God is the Lord,
the people he has chosen
as his heritage.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Yes, the Lord's eyes are
on those who fear him,
who hope in his merciful love,
to rescue their souls from death,
to keep them alive in famine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Our soul is waiting for the Lord.
He is our help and our shield.
May your merciful love
be upon us,
as we hope in you, O Lord.
